result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Davione D Wilkins

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on November 16, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with AMC or KLC. 
- Defendant shall not possess any type of dangerous weapon [as defined by Wis. Stat. 939.22(10)]. 
- Defendant shall not possess any type of facsimile weapon. 
Trial Judge - Br 5

2:11 PM Defendant Davione D Wilkins in court, in custody.  Attorney David Kennedy Anderson in court for Davione D Wilkins.  Prosecuting attorney Tomas Fernando Valerio in court for the State of Wisconsin. Parties stipulated to reinstate bail as previously set.
Bail/bond hearing on October 5, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:44 PM Defendant Davione D Wilkins not in court, in custody.  Attorney Dominic Richards in court for Davione D Wilkins.  Attorney Tim Helmberger in court for State of Wisconsin. Bench Warrant issued for defn's FTA @ 8:45 am Pre-trial Conference.
and notice of DNA and witness list - State's
Pre-trial conference on August 23, 2022 at 08:45 am.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with AMC or KLC. 
- Defendant shall not possess any type of dangerous weapon [as defined by Wis. Stat. 939.22(10)]. 
- Defendant shall not possess any type facsimile weapon.

02:23 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Ronald Gabriel Benavides.  Thersa Louise Lewandowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 08:45 am.
